text:
What's going on between these two?

What Would Jill Zarin Say to Bethenny Frankel Today?

The Beginning of the End of Bethenny and Jill

What Does Bethenny Have to Do to Not Hear This Question?

Create a free profile to get unlimited access to exclusive videos, sweepstakes, and more!

What Would Jill Zarin Say to Bethenny Frankel Today?

We weren't sure if we'd ever see the day when Bethenny Frankel and Jill Zarin completely squashed their years-long beef. But that day may come sooner than we think.

Jill recently posted a lovely message about Bethenny on Instagram, and it seems as though the ice has thawed somewhat between these former friends-turned-foes. "I’m sitting around going thru photos and put together a collage of @bethennyfrankel with my family," Jill wrote in a post that featured photos of Bethenny with her, her late husband Bobby Zarin, her daughter Ally Shapiro, and her mother Gloria Kamen. "Miss B...thanks for the memories tonight."

Bethenny attended Bobby's funeral at Riverside Memorial Chapel in New York City on January 15. "Today is a sad day with a silver lining. I laughed. I cried. I saw old faces & watched a family come together surrounding a loss," Bethenny shared on Twitter following the funeral. "'I have a dream' that Bobby’s death makes us realize what is important & treat each day as our last."

Today is a sad day with a silver lining. I laughed. I cried. I saw old faces & watched a family come together surrounding a loss. “I have a dream” that Bobby’s death makes us realize what is important & treat each day as our last. — Bethenny Frankel (@Bethenny) January 15, 2018

Bethenny also posted a series of tweets in remembrance of her late friend after his passing on January 13 following a battle with cancer.

“Here’s to those who wish us well. All the rest can go to hell.” One of Bobby Zarin’s favorites. Another one: “It’s all good,” and Bobby, now it really is... #RIP — Bethenny Frankel (@Bethenny) January 14, 2018

“One more...that’s it.” Bobby Zarin — Bethenny Frankel (@Bethenny) January 15, 2018

The first housewives producer who found me in the Hamptons just emailed me to tell me that it was Bobby who suggested me to her for RHONY. — Bethenny Frankel (@Bethenny) January 14, 2018

Jill shared during an appearance on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen in June that she would "absolutely" give Bethenny "a hug and a kiss" if they ever crossed paths again (clip above). However, Bethenny said she wasn't looking to rekindle her friendship with Jill during the most recent The Real Housewives of New York City reunion.

See more of Bethenny's thoughts on Jill, below.
title: RHONY's Jill Zarin Comments on Bethenny Frankel Friendship
